name: A Small Story
description:
A Small Story is exactly what it is. Made in one night to test Ren'py out, it's not particularly plot heavy. 

A Small Story is a prequel to A Simple Story. You, the player, is offered money to take care of Master's project...

4 endings! Gameplay is around 3-5 minutes.

All music belongs to Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
